requires-login.collection: Managing your collection requires you be logged in.
requires-login.settings: Managing your settings requires you be logged in.

volume.nsfw-hint: This cover has 16+ content. Enable it in settings to view.
volume.nsfw18-hint: This cover has 18+ content. Enable it in settings to view.

no-description.title: No description available
no-description.desc: There is no description for this series yet. Do you have an idea? Share your knowledge with the community and help us make MangaDB even better!

desc.pornographic: Content with explicit, adult themes that focus on sexual depictions. These works are only suitable for readers of legal age.
desc.action: Dynamic stories with tense battles, chases and intense confrontations. Heroes, rivalries and major challenges often take center stage.
desc.adventure: Tales of brave heroes, dangerous journeys and the discovery of unknown worlds. These stories often involve challenges that the protagonists have to overcome.
desc.aliens: Stories in which extraterrestrial life forms play a central role. They can be peaceful or hostile and are often set in alien galaxies or the future.
desc.animals: Themes in which animals or animal-like creatures play a leading role. This can include real or imaginative depictions, often with a deep connection to nature.
desc.cancelled: Series or works that were not completed, whether due to production problems, lack of interest or other reasons.
desc.comedy: Stories characterized by humour, witty dialogue and entertaining situations. They range from slapstick to clever wordplay.
desc.completed: Complete works that have a clear ending and are not continued. Perfect for readers who want to enjoy a self-contained story.
desc.cooking: Stories that deal with food, cooking and culinary experiences. They often showcase talented chefs or competitions related to the art of cooking.
desc.crime: Exciting stories about investigations, crimes and the hunt for perpetrators. The focus is often on detectives or police officers who have to solve complex cases.
desc.crossdressing: Stories in which characters wear clothing of the opposite sex, whether for cultural, personal or humorous reasons.
desc.demons: Supernatural beings from dark or mythological worlds that appear either as enemies or as fascinating characters.
desc.drama: Emotionally profound stories with complex characters and challenging conflicts. They can contain tragic, romantic or moving elements.
desc.ecchi: Content with revealing but not explicit scenes, often presented in a humorous or playful way.
desc.explicit: Content with explicit, often adult themes that may contain both violence and sexual elements.
desc.fantasy: Stories set in magical or fantastic worlds. They often involve magic, mythical creatures or epic adventures.
desc.ghosts: Supernatural stories in which ghosts, hauntings and mysterious apparitions play a central role.
desc.gore: Works with intense depictions of violence and bloody scenes, often set in the horror or thriller genre.
desc.gyaru: A unique Japanese style that focuses on fashion, beauty and an eye-catching personality. Characters often have tanned skin and eye-catching clothes.
desc.harem: Stories in which a main character is surrounded by several potential romantic partners competing for his or her attention.
desc.hiatus: Works that are currently not being continued but could possibly be continued in the future.
desc.historical: Stories set in times gone by or inspired by real historical events.
desc.horror: Exciting and often frightening stories that deal with dark themes, monsters or psychological horror.
desc.isekai: Stories in which characters are transported to another world, often through magic, rebirth or mysterious portals.
desc.mafia: Stories about criminal organizations, intrigues and the tough everyday life in the underground.
desc.magic: Tales about sorcery, magical beings and supernatural powers, which often play a central role.
desc.manga: Japanese comics that cover a variety of genres and narrative styles.
desc.manwha: Korean comics with a unique narrative style and an often colorful drawing style.
desc.manhua: Chinese comics that are characterized by their style and cultural influences.
desc.novel: Literary works published as written stories, often with complex plots and detailed characters.
desc.other: Content that does not fit into one of the existing categories.
desc.military: Stories about soldiers, wars, strategic conflicts and military tactics.
desc.monster girls: Stories with female characters who have animal or supernatural characteristics.
desc.monsters: Creatures and beings that are supernatural, terrifying or fantastic.
desc.music: Stories about musicians, bands, competitions or the passion for music.
desc.mystery: Exciting stories with secrets, puzzles and unexpected twists.
desc.ninja: Stories about ninja warriors, their special techniques and their mysterious world.
desc.ongoing: Works that are currently still being continued and published regularly.
desc.police: Stories about investigators, law enforcement officers and criminal cases, often based on real-life events.
desc.post-apocalyptic: Scenarios in a world after a major catastrophe in which survival is paramount.
desc.reincarnation: Stories in which characters are reborn in a new form or world after death.
desc.reverse harem: A story in which a female protagonist is courted by several male characters.
desc.romance: Stories about love, relationships and emotional connections between characters.
desc.safe: Content without offensive or sensitive topics that is suitable for a broad audience.
desc.samurai: Stories about honorable warriors from Japanese history and their battles.
desc.school life: Everyday stories about pupils and their experiences in everyday school life.
desc.sci-fi: Visions of the future, technological innovations and adventures in space or other futuristic worlds.
desc.sexual violence: Works that contain these topics. A trigger warning is often necessary.
desc.slice-of-life: Stories that deal with everyday experiences and interpersonal relationships.
desc.sports: Stories about competitions, team spirit and the sporting ambition of athletes.
desc.suggestive: Content with allusive or provocative elements that may be ambiguous.
desc.supernatural: Stories with magical beings, ghosts and phenomena beyond the normal world.
desc.survival: Characters fight for survival in extreme situations, be it in the wilderness or in a dystopian future.
desc.thriller: Exciting and captivating stories with thrills and unpredictable twists.
desc.time travel: Stories in which characters travel through different eras and experience their effects.
desc.vampires: Stories about blood-sucking creatures and their mythology, often with romantic or dark elements.
desc.video games: Stories that revolve around the world of video games. These include stories about gamers, tournaments, e-sports or even characters who are drawn into a game.
desc.virtual reality: Stories in which virtual worlds play a central role. Characters experience adventures in simulated realities, often with the help of futuristic technology or VR games.
desc.yaoi: Romantic stories with male main characters in romantic relationships.
desc.yuri: Romantic stories with female main characters in romantic relationships.
desc.zombies: Stories about undead creatures, apocalypses and the fight for survival.

theme.title: Theme
theme.desc: Choose from different themes to customize the appearance of our website.

theme_accent.title: Theme accent color
theme_accent.desc: Choose your own accent color to customize the appearance of our website.

show-drag-indicator.title: 3D View - Show Drag Indicator
show-drag-indicator.desc: Hide or show the drag indicator shown in the 3D view of a volume when opened for the first time.

content.title: Language of the content (series, volumes, ...)
content.desc: Customize the language of the content. If an option other than User interface language is selected, content will be loaded in this language instead if available.

nsfw_mode.title: Display of adult content
nsfw_mode.desc: Decide which content (suggestive, explicit) you want to see and which not. To view 18+ content you must be age-verified.

login.title: Login to MangaDB
login.desc: Login to manage your collection, reading history and much more. Become a part of the community

register.title: Register to MangaDB
register.desc: Register to manage your collection, reading history and much more. Become a part of the community

dialog.logout-question: Do you really want to logout?

link-dialog.title: Warning
link-dialog.desc: You will be redirected to an external site. The content may not be safe to view at this time.

report-dialog.title: Report Problem
report-dialog.login-required: You must be logged in to report problems.
report-dialog.role-required: You don't have the permission to report problems.
report-dialog.empty-desc: The description must not be empty.

list-dialog.title: Lists
list-dialog.no-lists: You haven't created any lists for series yet.
list-dialog.no-volume-lists: You haven't created any lists for volumes yet.
list-dialog.not-selected: You have to select a list first.

volume-jump-dialog.title: Jump to Volume:
volume-jump-dialog.already: You are already at this volume.
